title: 38. Pfizer’s CEO on the Big Gamble That Brought Us the COVID Vaccine
description: Bapu Jena talks with Albert Bourla about his unusual path to the top, developing a life-saving vaccine in record time, and the second-hardest decision he made along the way.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Bapu Jena talks with Albert Bourla about his unusual path to the top, developing a life-saving vaccine in record time, and the second-hardest decision he made along the way.
